attributes.action: Ban Motorists From Driving For Using A Mobile Telephone Behind The Wheel Of A Car Etc...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I see more and more people everyday still using there mobile telephone behind the wheel of a car etc. These people should get a instant ban if caught then maybe that would stop them using them. These people are driving without due care and attention and are just ignoring the law because in my eyes it is too soft. People are getting hurt or even killed because they are too lazy to stop or just wait until their journey ends. Please make this offence a instant ban.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
